images.intro: Hello there! Thanks for dropping by. Isn't it a beautiful day?. You can get started by typing the options in the below menu:
images.title: SPN
images.description:
'001' to get an intro of SPN.
 '002' to understand the offering Automation as a Service.
 '003' to join any upcoming event/meeting.
 '004' to learn about the Cognitive AI Workbench.

Click on Button:'Next' to see other roles. Good Luck and Have a wonderful time.
